snippet: Kyle Busch took the lead after the final restart late Saturday in Fort Worth, Tex., to complete his second Nascar weekend sweep in a row.
abstract: Kyle Busch wins Xfinity auto race in Fort Worth, Tex, and Camping World Truck Series race at Martinsville Speedway.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch took the lead after the final restart late Saturday in Fort Worth, Tex., to complete his second Nascar weekend sweep in a row.

headline.main: Kyle Busch Makes Second Nascar Sweep
